name: Squirrel and nuts
description:
Squirrel and nuts is a platformer game, with a side view. The main characters of the game are squirrel. The goal of the game is to go through various forest levels and collect nuts. Nuts need to be collected in order to replenish the strength that the squirrel will spend during its journey. The squirrel can attack opponents by jumping on top of them. But you always have a choice. The player can attack the characters or simply jump over them. Balance while jumping in the air. Along the way, various traps and obstacles in the form of spikes and flying balls are waiting for you. This game will help you return to your childhood if you have played such
games before, or will give you new sensations if you are playing this kind of games for the first time. This game is sure to give you
a pleasant experience.

Features of the game:
- Nice pixel graphics.
- Moderately challenging and addictive gameplay.
- Good soundtrack.
